description: Categorical Sector and Location Type pairs which are referenced in the Project Core Schema.
title: Sector Location Schema

description.const: a structure built for permanent use, as a house, factory, etc.
an area, park or pasture for community use

location_type_fr.const: zone de distribution des équipements / matériels

location_type_de.const: Verteilungsgebiet von Material / Ausstattung (u.a. Computer, Server, Digitalisierung, Autos)

description.const: a building or buildings housing a center, institute, foundation, hospital, prison, mission, courthouse, etc.
one or more buildings where goods are manufactured, processed or fabricated
a tract of land on which many houses of similar design are built according to a development plan
a building where objects of permanent interest in one or more of the arts and sciences are preserved and exhibited
commercial building where business and/or services are conducted
a facility where research is carried out

location_type_fr.const: système de gestion environnementale et sociale
zone de distribution des subventions de contrepartie
soutien aux groupes d’épargne / VSLA / SACCO

location_type_de.const: Unterstützung von Spargruppen / dörfliche Spar- und Kreditgruppen (VSLA) bzw. -Kooperativen (SACCO)

description.const: a building and/or tract of land used for improving agriculture
an area under cultivation
an enclosure for displaying selected plant or animal life
an area of grasses and shrubs used for grazing

location_type_fr.const: zone de contrôle du sol / de l’érosion améliorée

description.const: a tract of level or terraced land which is irrigated
a place where plants are propagated for transplanting or grafting
a small dam in a stream, designed to raise the water level or to divert stream flow through a desired channel

location_type.const: certified sustainable aquaculture or fisheries (MSC, ASC)

location_type_fr.const: aquaculture ou pêche durable certifiée (MSC, ASC)

description.const: a small standing waterbody
building(s) where instruction in one or more branches of knowledge takes place /

location_type.const: area covered by off-grid renewable energy (ex. photovoltaic grid)

location_type_fr.const: zone couverte par des énergies renouvelables hors réseau (par ex. réseau photovoltaïque)

location_type_de.const: Abdeckungsgebiet netzunabhängiger erneuerbarer Energie (z. B. Photovoltaik-Netz)

location_type.const: area covered by on-grid renewable energy

location_type_fr.const: zone couverte par des énergies renouvelables en réseau

description.const: a building where electricity is generated from water power
(ex. photovoltaic power station)
a solar-powered facility for pumping water from a major well or through a pipeline

location_type_fr.const: système de stockage d’énergie par batterie (BESS)

description.const: an establishment for the custody, loan, exchange or issue of money, for the extension of credit, and for facilitating the transmission of funds
an area, usually a section of a port, where goods may be received and shipped free of customs duty and of most customs regulations
an area characterized by industrial activity
a facility housing local governmental offices, usually a city, town, or village hall
a building where customs and duties are paid on goods
building housing firefighters and/or fire fighting equipment

location_type.const: cadastre / land management / tenure system / area

location_type_fr.const: cadastre / gestion foncière / système foncier / zone
soutien à la décentralisation et au développement communal

description.const: a medical facility associated with a hospital for outpatients
a building where medical or dental aid is dispensed
a building in which sick or injured, especially those confined to bed, are medically treated
a zone of variable width straddling the shoreline

location_type_fr.const: système de sécurité aéronautique / contrôle de vol

description.const: a structure erected across an obstacle such as a stream, road, etc., in order to carry roads, railroads, and pedestrians across

location_type_fr.const: bus à haut niveau de service (BHNS) / système de bus

description.const: bus to bike, ferry to bus, train to tuktuk etc.
a place provided with terminal and transfer facilities for loading and discharging waterborne cargo or passengers, usually located in a harbor

location_type.const: rail operation control system / intelligent transport system (ITS)

location_type_fr.const: système de contrôle de l’exploitation ferroviaire/système de transport intelligent (STI)

location_type_de.const: Steuerungssystem für den Bahnbetrieb / Intelligentes Verkehrssystem (ITS)

description.const: a permanent twin steel-rail track on which freight and passenger cars move long distances
an open way with improved surface for transportation of animals, people and vehicles
a railroad used for mass public transportation primarily in urban areas, all or part of the system may be located below, above, or at ground level

location_type_fr.const: centre de gestion du trafic / STI

description.const: traffic management center / intelligent transport system (ITS)
a building for storing goods, especially provisions
bus station
a site occupied by tents, huts, or other shelters for temporary use

location_type_fr.const: zone de distribution des fournitures d’urgence

description.const: a camp used by refugees

location_type_de.const: Entwaffnung, Demobilisierung und Wiedereingliederung der Kombattanten (DDR)

location_type_fr.const: centre d’accueil pour femmes / soutien aux victimes de la violence liée au sexe

location_type_de.const: Soziales Sicherungssystem / Zugang zu sozialen Basisdienstleistungen
Beschäftigungszuschüsse (Leistungen zur besseren Integration in den Arbeitsmarkt, z.B. Existenzgründungszuschüsse, Lohnfortzahlungen, Lohnsubventionen)

location_type.const: certified sustainable forest management (FSC, Rainforest Alliance, PEFC)

location_type_fr.const: gestion forestière durable certifiée (FSC, Rainforest Alliance, PEFC)

location_type_de.const: zertifizierte nachhaltige Waldbewirtschaftung (FSC, Rainforest Alliance, PEFC)

location_type_fr.const: connectivité des corridors et des écosystèmes

description.const: a collection of buildings and facilities for carrying out forest management
an area dominated by tree vegetation
a mass of ice, usually at high latitudes or high elevations, with sufficient thickness to flow away from the source area in lobes, tongues, or masses
an area dominated by grass vegetation

location_type.const: habitat or species management area (IUCN Cat IV)

location_type_fr.const: zone de gestion des habitats ou des espèces (catégorie IV de l’UICN)
aire du patrimoine autochtone et communautaire (APAC)

description.const: a large inland body of standing water

location_type.const: natural monument or feature (IUCN Cat III)

location_type_fr.const: monument ou élément naturel (catégorie III de l’UICN)

description.const: one of the major divisions of the vast expanse of salt water covering part of the earth

location_type.const: protected area with sustainable use of natural resources (IUCN Cat VI)

location_type_fr.const: zone protégée avec utilisation durable des ressources naturelles (catégorie VI de l’UICN)

location_type_de.const: Schutzgebiet mit nachhaltiger Nutzung natürlicher Ressourcen (IUCN Cat VI)

location_type.const: protected landscape or seascape (IUCN Cat V)

location_type_fr.const: paysage terrestre ou marin protégé (catégorie V de l’UICN)

description.const: an area of low trees, bushes, and shrubs stunted by some environmental limitation
a large body of salt water more or less confined by continuous land or chains of islands forming a subdivision of an ocean

location_type_fr.const: réserve naturelle stricte (catégorie Ia de l’UICN)

description.const: a wetland dominated by tree vegetation
a tract of land used by nomadic or other tribes
a natural, well-defined channel produced by flowing water, or an artificial channel designed to carry flowing water

location_type.const: area under payment for environmental services / incentive system

location_type_fr.const: surface rémunérée à titre de services environnementaux / système d’incitation
autres mesures de conservation efficace par zone (AMCEZ)

description.const: a paved urban thoroughfare
a place where goods are bought and sold at regular intervals

an urban shopping area featuring a variety of shops surrounding a usually open-air concourse reserved for pedestrian traffic; or a large suburban building or group of buildings containing various shops with associated passageways

location_type_fr.const: amélioration de la collecte des déchets

description.const: a place for trash and garbage disposal in which the waste is buried between layers of earth to build up low-lying land

location_type_fr.const: captage et traitement des gaz de décharge
autres installations de traitement des déchets
usine de valorisation énergétique des déchets
station de traitement d’eau potable (sans dessalement)

description.const: an artificial pond or lake

location_type_fr.const: usine de traitement des eaux usées

description.const: facility for the processing of sewage and/or wastewater
a contained pool or tank of water at, below, or above ground level
a cylindrical hole, pit, or tunnel drilled or dug down to a depth from which water, oil, or gas can be pumped or brought to the surface

location_type_fr.const: zone de protection des ressources en eau
